CustomField.description:
Created Low Wage Occupation checkbox field on the Case MGMT object; added to WCA/Garment page layouts in the Wage Claim section.
Update (7/20/15) - Per client's feedback, deprecated checkbox solution and replaced with Low Wage Occupation picklist containing the following values: Add a field for Low Wage Occupation Identifier with the following values: • N/A (Default) • Domestic Worker • Agricultural Employee • Food processing • Garment Employee • Car Wash Employee • Janitorial • Construction • Restaurant • Warehouse • Hotel worker • Residential Care worker • Nail salon worker • Security guard • Day laborer • Other - Paid at minimum wage rate or less • Other - Paid via piece rate
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this field only if the wage claimant has a qualified low wage occupation.
CustomField.label: Low Wage Occupation - Deprecated
